name: New York Post

roles_in_work.title: Michelle Yeoh wins Best Actress at Oscars 2023: ‘Beacon of hope’

biography: The New York Post (NY Post) is a daily tabloid newspaper published in New York City. The Post also operates NYPost.com, the celebrity gossip site PageSix.com, and the entertainment site Decider.com. It was established in 1801 by Federalist and Founding Father Alexander Hamilton, and became a respected broadsheet in the 19th century under the name New York Evening Post.
